data.name: Fay's Factory Demo
data.detailed_description:
The magical industrial revolution is here, and you have to see it to believe it. Build your factory of sorcery, prepare some dueling spells, and come to the Festival to argue about capital, watch the art competitions, start a working class revolution or kick back before the fireplace in the local tavern.

Demonstration Festival is a demo for my game, Fay's Factory. It contains one slightly altered adventure from the middle of the main game, and your progress will not carry over (but there is a little something for you down the line for keeping the save file). Fay's Factory is still in development and some things will change between this demo and release version.

There is about half an hour of content in this demo.

Have a happy Demonstration Festival!
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: In this short demo for Fay's Factory, visit a Festival celebrating the magical industrial revolution, do a couple of duels, have a drink at the tavern, and give a talk of your lifetime.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Amd Ryzen 5600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070 super
  • Additional Notes: this is my computer and the game runs well! i can *recommend* it. (it will run fine on other pcs too, it's a unity game)

content_descriptors.notes: Characters and player may talk about sex, use profanities, consume alcohol and drugs, participate in cartoonish duels and oppress the working class.
